original_text: that these days of Purim should be observed at their appointed seasons, as Mordecai the Jew and Queen Esther obligated them, and as they had obligated themselves and their offspring, with regard to their fasts and their lamenting.
korean_text: 정한 기간에 이 부림일을 지키게 하였으니 이는 유다인 모르드개와 왕후 에스더가 명령한 바와 유다인이 금식하며 부르짖은 것으로 말미암아 자기와 자기 자손을 위하여 정한 바가 있음이더라

sentences.original_text: that these days of Purim should be observed
as Mordecai the Jew and Queen Esther obligated them
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 사람 모르드개와 에스더 왕후가 그들에게 의무를 부과했던 것처럼

sentences.original_text: and as they had obligated themselves and their offspring
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 자기들과 자손에게 의무를 부과했던 것처럼

sentences.original_text: with regard to their fasts and their lamenting
